skills.skill: USB, UART, PCIe, SDIO, SPI, I2C, I2S

duties_responsibilities.duty: Design firmware system to work closely with the underlying ASIC to provide the best performance and lowest power in the industry.
Collaborate with audio algorithm development team to integrate various audio-related algorithms and design optimal audio products.
Verify various HW blocks before chip tapeout and debug issues with the system, ASIC, SW, and FW team members.
Work with tier 1 customers to understand their requests, design and deliver solutions to meet or exceed customer expectations.
Investigate and develop acoustic system design for optimal performance for various customers.
Support tier 1 customers, collaborate with teams, and possess excellent interpersonal, communication, and writing skills.

education_certification.credential: BSCS/BSEE or MSCS/MSEE degree with 12+ years of related experience (Ph.D. in related field is a plus)
